et: earlier, "inoculation with fluid from cowpox pustules," from {it}vaccine{/it} "of cowpox" (in the phrases {it}vaccine matter, vaccine virus{/it}) + {et_link|-ation|-ation} {ma}{mat|vaccine|}{/ma}

dt.t: But state health officials and vaccine proponents have argued that unvaccinated children pose a health risk to others. They point to the recent measles outbreak in Johnson County and elsewhere, a disease that has reappeared since the {wi}anti-vaccination{/wi} movement has grown.
{wi}Anti-vaccination{/wi} parents have slammed a new law that bans unimmunised children from kindergartens.
